recipesJson.name: Blapplebean Ice Cream
recipesJson.author: heatbbx
recipesJson.description:
Was influenced by Fizzmustard's Mustard Milk to start playing around with VBIC at a high %. Then Shyndo gave me the idea to try out apple here: 
https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/38862#d_cream_by_shyndo

Comes out to a really nice BlueBerry Ice Cream with the nice sweet/tart kick of apple. As though there's a slice of apple on the bite of ice cream. I really really like this and I hope you all enjoy :)

reviews.text: I dont usually like any recipes ive ever tried with blueberry in it at all but this is absolutely delicious. Thankyou so much for sharing. Ive now found my new adv after having the same one for a year as nothing else came close to beating it. And you've inspired me to experiment with blueberry a bit more!! Oh and this was only after a 24 steep so i cant wait to see how it develops!
This recipe is really good, for me it's more of a bubblegum ice cream but who cares? Very tasty vape!
